outputs.output_descr:
1. Enhanced political dialogue between the political parties represented in the Committee

2. Increased capacity of lawmakers in the area of minority rights and inter-ethnic relations

3. Greater transparency of the work of the Committee available to citizens

4. Greater outreach with regional and global Parliamentary Networks.

project_descr: Enhance political dialogue between  political parties represented in Parliament, and strengthen the capacities of MPs through provision of technical workshops and networking opportunities  with regional and global Parliamentary Networks
